short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill automatically the Stripe's Test Card and payment info for checkout sessions in Test Mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Marvin Stripe's Test Card Filler is the ultimate browser extension for developers and testers working with Stripe payment forms. With a single click, this handy tool autofills test credit card details and payment information directly into Stripe's checkout fields in test mode. It's designed to save you time and effort during testing phases, ensuring a smooth and efficient workflow. Whether you're debugging or demonstrating, Marvin Stripe's Test Card Filler makes it a breeze to handle payment simulations. So, leave the manual data entry behind, and let this extension streamline your testing process.
